text: Læa phwk khea midi tækyæk kan wentæ hlangcak di mi khwam ru mayang phwk khea læw thangni pheraa khwam risʹya rahwang phwk khea kanxeng læa hak michı likhit di banthuk wi thi phracea khxng cea cnthung wara thi kahnd wi læw nænxn k ca nı rahwang phwk khea thuk tadsin læa thæcring brrda phu di rab mrdk khamphir ni hlangcak phwk khea nan xyu nı kar sngsay wunway keiyw kab khamphir nan
